tool_description: Calculates comprehensive cost estimates, material quantities, and labor requirements for fire suppression system projects.

system_size.description: System size category (small, medium, large, extra-large)

error_messages: Invalid system size: Must be small, medium, large, or extra-large.

cost_breakdown.description: Detailed breakdown of costs by category

estimate_summary.description: Summary of resource estimates and assumptions
